definition: to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before

sentences.english: He had laughed at those who died with prayers on their lips.
sentences.chinese: 他曾嘲笑过那些临刑前还在念念有词地做着祷告的人。

sentences.english: Roger in his pre-sentence before execution so that people are flocking towards the sea.
sentences.chinese: 罗杰，他在临刑前的一句话让人们趋之若鹜奔向大海。

sentences.english: He told the officials at the execution to observe Wang's words and deeds very carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他叮嘱监斩官们仔细观察王临刑的言行。

sentences.english: Die of blade etc. Get there in time.
sentences.chinese: 临刑之际，刀锋等人及时赶到。

definition: to execute by firing squad/same as 槍斃|枪毙
an execution/to put sb to death
prisoner that awaits execution/convict sentenced to death/someone on death row
to extend one's neck in preparation for execution (idiom)
to behead sb and display the head in public
Tan Sitong (1865-1898), Qing writer and politician, one of the Six Gentlemen Martyrs 戊戌六君子 of the unsuccessful reform movement of 1898
